00021 #ifndef _MOTOR_H_

00024 #include "PID.nxc"

00035 inline void MotorStart(int motor, int power)
00036 {
00037      SetOutput(motor,
00038                OutputMode, OUT_MODE_MOTORON | OUT_MODE_BRAKE,
00039                Power, power,
00040                UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_MODE | UF_UPDATE_SPEED | UF_UPDATE_RESET_BLOCK_COUNT,
00041                RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_RUNNING);
00042 }
00043 
00047 inline void MotorStop(int motor)
00048 {
00049      SetOutput(motor,
00050                OutputMode, OUT_MODE_BRAKE,
00051                Power, 0,
00052                UpdateFlags,  UF_UPDATE_MODE | UF_UPDATE_SPEED,
00053                RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_IDLE);
00054 }
00055 
00059 inline void MotorSetPower(int motor, int power)
00060 {
00061      SetOutput(motor, Power, power, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_SPEED);
00062 }
00063 
00071 inline void MotorStartSync(int motor1, int motor2, int power)
00072 {
00073      int motors[];
00074      ArrayBuild(motors, motor1, motor2);
00075 
00076      SetOutput(motors,
00077                OutputMode, OUT_MODE_MOTORON | OUT_MODE_BRAKE | OUT_MODE_REGULATED,
00078                Power, power,
00079                TurnRatio, 0,
00080                RegMode, OUT_REGMODE_SYNC,
00081                UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_MODE | UF_UPDATE_SPEED | UF_UPDATE_RESET_BLOCK_COUNT,
00082                RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_RUNNING);
00083 }
00084 
00088 inline void MotorStopSync(int motor1, int motor2)
00089 {
00090      int motors[];
00091      ArrayBuild(motors, motor1, motor2);
00092      SetOutput(motors,
00093                OutputMode, OUT_MODE_BRAKE,
00094                Power, 0,
00095                UpdateFlags,  UF_UPDATE_MODE | UF_UPDATE_SPEED,
00096                RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_IDLE);
00097 }
00098 
00102 inline void MotorSetPowerSync(int motor1, int motor2, int power)
00103 {
00104      int motors[];
00105      ArrayBuild(motors, motor1, motor2);
00106      SetOutput(motors, Power, power, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_SPEED);
00107 }
00108 
00113 inline void MotorSetTurnRatio(int motor1, int motor2, int turnRatio)
00114 {
00115      int motors[];
00116      ArrayBuild(motors, motor1, motor2);
00117      SetOutput(motors, TurnRatio, turnRatio);
00118 }
00119 
00124 inline void MotorSetTurnRatioPower(int motor1, int motor2, int turnRatio, int power)
00125 {
00126      int motors[];
00127      ArrayBuild(motors, motor1, motor2);
00128      SetOutput(motors, TurnRatio, turnRatio, Power, power, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_SPEED);
00129 }
00130 
00135 int MotorRotateAngle(int motor, int power, long angle,
00136                      long PValue, long IValue, long DValue)
00137 {
00138      int samplingPeriod = 20; /* msec */
00139      long motorTacho, output, lastError;
00140      PIDControl pidControl;
00141 
00142      PIDControlInit(pidControl,
00143                     1000,     /* PID scale */
00144                     PValue,
00145                     IValue,
00146                     DValue,
00147                     5,        /* Steady state counts threshold */
00148                     2,        /* Output gain */
00149                     power);   /* Output absolute maximum */
00150 
00151      /* Speed is evaluated in the loop below */
00152      MotorStart(motor, 0);
00153 
00154      PIDControlSetPoint(pidControl, angle);
00155 
00156      while(!PIDControlCheckEnd(pidControl))
00157      {
00158          motorTacho = GetOutput(motor, BlockTachoCount);
00159          output = PIDControlStep(pidControl, motorTacho);
00160          MotorSetPower(motor, output);
00161          Wait(samplingPeriod);
00162      }
00163      MotorStop(motor);
00164      lastError = PIDControlGetLastError(pidControl);
00165      return lastError;
00166 }
00167 
00173 int MotorRotateAngleSync(int motor1, int motor2, int power, long angle,
00174                          long PValue, long IValue, long DValue)
00175 {
00176      int samplingPeriod = 20; /* msec */
00177      long motorTacho, output, lastError;
00178      PIDControl pidControl;
00179 
00180      PIDControlInit(pidControl,
00181                     1000,     /* PID scale */
00182                     PValue,
00183                     IValue,
00184                     DValue,
00185                     5,        /* Steady state counts threshold */
00186                     2,        /* Output gain */
00187                     power);   /* Output absolute maximum */
00188 
00189      /* Speed is evaluated in the loop below */
00190      MotorStartSync(motor1, motor2, 0);
00191 
00192      PIDControlSetPoint(pidControl, angle);
00193 
00194      while(!PIDControlCheckEnd(pidControl))
00195      {
00196          motorTacho = GetOutput(motor1, BlockTachoCount);
00197          output = PIDControlStep(pidControl, motorTacho);
00198          MotorSetPowerSync(motor1, motor2, output);
00199          Wait(samplingPeriod);
00200      }
00201      MotorStopSync(motor1, motor2);
00202      lastError = PIDControlGetLastError(pidControl);
00203      return lastError;
00204 }
00205 
00211 int MotorRotateAngleDiff(int motor1, int motor2, int power, long angle,
00212                                  long PValue, long IValue, long DValue)
00213 {
00214      int samplingPeriod = 20; /* msec */
00215      long motorTacho, output, lastError;
00216      PIDControl pidControl;
00217 
00218      PIDControlInit(pidControl,
00219                     1000,     /* PID scale */
00220                     PValue,
00221                     IValue,
00222                     DValue,
00223                     5,        /* Steady state counts threshold */
00224                     1,        /* Output gain */
00225                     power);   /* Output absolute maximum */
00226      PIDControlSetIntegralLimit(pidControl, 20);
00227      
00228      /* Speed is evaluated in the loop below */
00229      MotorStartSync(motor1, motor2, 0);
00230      
00231      if (angle > 0)
00232          MotorSetTurnRatio(motor1, motor2, -100);
00233      else
00234          MotorSetTurnRatio(motor1, motor2, +100);
00235 
00236      PIDControlSetPoint(pidControl, angle);
00237 
00238      while(!PIDControlCheckEnd(pidControl))
00239      {
00240          motorTacho = GetOutput(motor1, BlockTachoCount);
00241          output = PIDControlStep(pidControl, motorTacho);
00242 
00243          if (output > 0)
00244              MotorSetTurnRatioPower(motor1, motor2, -100, output);
00245          else
00246              MotorSetTurnRatioPower(motor1, motor2, +100, output);
00247 
00248          Wait(samplingPeriod);
00249      }
00250      MotorStopSync(motor1, motor2);
00251      MotorSetTurnRatio(motor1, motor2, 0);
00252      lastError = PIDControlGetLastError(pidControl);
00253      return lastError;
00254 }
00255 
00256 /* Test */
00257 
00258 #define TEST_ANGLE 180
00259 
00260 task TestMotorRotate ()
00261 {
00262      MotorRotateAngle(OUT_B, 100, TEST_ANGLE, 450, 0, 0);
00263 }
00264 
00265 task TestMotorRotateSync ()
00266 {
00267      MotorRotateAngleSync(OUT_B, OUT_C, 100, TEST_ANGLE, 450, 0, 0);
00268 }
00269 
00270 task TestMotorRotateDiff ()
00271 {
00272      MotorRotateAngleDiff(OUT_B, OUT_C, 100, TEST_ANGLE, 250, 0, 0);
00273 }
00274 
00275 void TestPID()
00276 {
00277      Plotter pe;
00278 
00279      ClearScreen();
00280      PlotterInit(pe, PLOT_TYPE_LINE, 0, 100, -180, 180);
00281 
00282      int motor = OUT_B;
00283      start TestMotorRotateSync;
00284 
00285      int t;
00286      while (1)
00287      {
00288           int error = (TEST_ANGLE - GetOutput(OUT_B, TachoCount)) * 32 / TEST_ANGLE;
00289           PlotterPlot(pe, t, error);
00290           Wait(20);
00291           t++;
00292           if (t >= 100)
00293           {
00294               t = 0;
00295               Wait(50000);
00296               break;
00297           }
00298      }
00299 }
